pointsSection.title: Why Use a Points System?
pointsSection.description: Our closed-loop point system minimizes payment processing fees and keeps more money in your community. Points are available instantly (unlike credit cards that take 2-5 days), making escrow and returns seamless. Buy points once, trade with neighbors, and redeem for gift cards or donate to charity.

safetySection.title: Built for Safety & Convenience
safetySection.description: CasaGrown is designed with features that make buying and selling homegrown produce, simple, safe and rewarding

transaction.title: Transaction Safety & Security
bullets: Built-in escrow system protects buyers and sellers
Drop-off option for safety and convenience
Dispute handling for complete peace of mind

instant.title: Instant Point Availability
instant.description: Unlike credit cards or Venmo which take 2-5 business days to make funds available, CasaGrown points are available immediately upon order completion.
bullets: No waiting periods or banking delays

community.title: Give Back to Your Community
community.description: Turn your backyard surplus into community support by donating points to local charities and food banks.
bullets: Make a difference with every sale

missionSection.title: Why Trade Homegrown?
missionSection.description: We're on a mission to eliminate wastage of food grown in American backyards and expand access to freshly picked produce to many more people.

freshness.title: Incredible Freshness
freshness.description: Fruits in grocery stores often take weeks to months to reach the shelves. CasaGrown connects you with neighbors for produce picked fresh from the tree.

waste.title: Stop Food Waste
waste.description: Over 11.5 billion pounds of backyard produce goes to waste every year. Join us in saving it to feed 28 million people.

inflation.title: Beat Inflation
inflation.description: Earn extra cash from your garden selling homegrown abundance to neighbors, or save money by finding high-quality produce right next door.

teen.title: Teen Opportunity
teen.description: Empower teens to learn business skills and earn pocket money by selling and delivering homegrown produce.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of neighbors already trading homegrown produce. Start saving money, reducing waste, and building community today.

footer.tagline: Connecting communities through sustainable food sharing.
